title: Dragon Lake, Siberia
description: Nicknamed “Dragon Lake,” this body of water is formed by the Bratskove Reservoir, built along the Angara river in southern Siberia, near the city of Bratsk. This image was acquired in winter, when the lake is frozen. This is a natural color composite image made using blue, green, and red wavelengths.
theme:
WINTER. Special gallery to set the mood
for snowy days
